title: How to Stop Judging Yourself | Tom Bilyeu AMA
description: Tom answers questions from the community. Subscribe to our Channel: http://bit.ly/2HP4F3h You can submit your questions in advance to ama@impacttheory.com, with the subject line “AMA Question”.   QUESTION TOPICS How to change your perspective if you feel like a failure [2:44] How to show up and be vulnerable when facing a difficult situation with a loved one  [8:56] What to do when friends or family are asking you for money  [13:07] How to prioritize your education and manage your time to make sure you’re doing the right amount of learning and taking action [15:37] What to do when you are lost and you hate your job (Tom’s 90-day challenge) [20:39] How to balance meeting new people for potential romantic relationships with your business life… and if you should be in a relationship at all? [24:29] How to get better at whatever you want and make sure you’re acquiring the right skills for what you want to achieve [28:39] How to overcome the fear that stands in your way of becoming the person you want to become [32:17] The moral of this AMA [35:10]
